name: ST_TOTAL_AIRCRAFT_DESTROYED
displayName: Total number of planes and helicopters destroyed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_VEHICLES_DESTROYED
displayName: Total number of ground-based vehicles destroyed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_SHIPS_DESTROYED
displayName: Total number of ships destroyed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_BUILDINGS_DESTROYED
displayName: Total number of buildings destroyed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_DEATHS
displayName: Total number of times the player died.

name: ST_TOTAL_EJECTIONS
displayName: Total number of times the player ejected.

name: ST_TOTAL_MISSIONS_COMPLETED
displayName: Total number of missions successfully completed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_MISSIONS_FAILED
displayName: Total number of missions failed by the player.

name: ST_TOTAL_SCORE
displayName: Total score from all missions the player ever played, except Quick Combat.

name: ST_MAX_QUICK_COMBAT_SCORE
displayName: Highest score the player ever reached in Quick Combat.

name: ST_NUM_AIR_MEDALS
displayName: Number of Air Medals awarded to the player.

name: ST_NUM_BRONZE_STARS
displayName: Number of Bronze Stars awarded to the player.

name: ST_NUM_MEDALS_OF_HONOR
displayName: Number of Congressional Medals of Honor awarded to the player.

name: ST_NUM_FYLING_CROSSES
displayName: Number of Flying Crosses awarded to the player.

name: ST_NUM_PURPLE_HEARTS
displayName: Number of Purple Hearts awarded to the player.

name: ST_NUM_SILVER_STARS
displayName: Number of Silver Stars awarded to the player.
